scenes.description: The video opens with an animated title card for 'SEJONG START-UP LIVE 2020', featuring dynamic light trails and a bright, ethereal background.
A close-up shot of a microphone on a podium, with the event's blue and pink branded backdrop visible, displaying Korean text about 'Sejong Startup Week' and the 'untact era'.

A wide, tracking shot moves across the event hall, showcasing multiple startup booths with products and attendees. A text overlay explains that 'Sejong Startup Week 2020' was conducted via YouTube Live due to quarantine policies.
A static medium shot of a professional video camera on a tripod, actively filming the event, reinforcing the 'live' aspect mentioned earlier.
A medium close-up of female host Lee Ji-yo, holding papers and making a peace sign while speaking. Her name and title are displayed as a text overlay.
A medium shot of a second female host, Lee Seo-hyun, speaking with event booths visible in the background. Her name and title are displayed as a text overlay.
A medium shot shows a male and female host rehearsing with a startup representative, likely for the live commerce segment, with a text overlay indicating it's a rehearsal.
A medium shot captures a female host holding a product and interacting with a startup representative, continuing the rehearsal scene.
Another medium shot shows a female host engaging with a startup representative, with a camera operator visible in the background, highlighting the production aspect.
A medium shot of a female host holding a product and talking to a startup representative, part of the ongoing rehearsal.
A medium shot shows a female host interacting with a camera operator and another crew member, indicating behind-the-scenes preparation.
A medium shot of host Lee Seo-hyun at a podium, speaking into a microphone during the opening ceremony. A text overlay indicates '개막식' (Opening Ceremony).
A wide shot captures the female host speaking at the podium, providing a full view of the stage setup and event branding.
A medium shot of Park Chun-soon, Director of Sejong Creative Economy Innovation Center, delivering opening remarks at the podium, with his name and title displayed.
A wide shot of Director Park Chun-soon speaking at the podium, showing the entire stage and backdrop.
A wide shot of host Lee Seo-hyun at the podium, concluding the opening ceremony and thanking the audience.
A wide shot of the event hall, showing a camera operator filming a male startup representative, with a text overlay announcing the start of live commerce.
A two-shot of the two female hosts, waving and enthusiastically introducing the live commerce segment in front of an event banner.
The two female hosts continue their conversation, building excitement and preparing to introduce the products for the live commerce.
Host Lee Ji-yo introduces a product, gesturing towards a display of 'Carmin Teatree Lemon Mask' sets on a table.
Lee Ji-yo holds up a mask packet, opens it, and smells the mask, describing its fresh lemon scent and moisturizing properties.
Host Lee Seo-hyun introduces the 'Macklin Premium Peptide Volume Essence,' holding a bottle and explaining its benefits, with a male representative standing beside her.
A vertical screen capture of the live commerce broadcast shows Lee Seo-hyun presenting the essence, with a stream of real-time viewer comments visible on the side, indicating audience engagement.
Host Lee Ji-yo introduces 'Skinprest.T Mineral Healing Mist,' holding up a large bottle and a smaller travel-sized one.
Host Lee Seo-hyun demonstrates a 'Saemju' dried persimmon snack, cutting a piece and tasting it, emphasizing its texture.
Lee Seo-hyun continues to enjoy the dried persimmon, describing its firm texture and delicious taste.
Host Lee Ji-yo introduces 'C.LOCK Auto-lock Window Handle,' demonstrating its features.
Host Lee Seo-hyun introduces 'Fun Golf' home screen golf, pointing at the tablet screen and explaining the various courses available, with a male representative beside her.
The male representative demonstrates the 'Fun Golf' sensor, showing how it attaches to a golf club and explains its function in simulating a real golf experience.
Host Lee Ji-yo introduces 'Phytoscent' natural cypress disinfectant, holding a spray bottle and interacting with a male representative who explains its origin and natural ingredients.
A vertical screen capture of the live commerce shows the representative spraying the disinfectant and Lee Ji-yo reacting to the scent, with live viewer comments scrolling.
A two-shot features Lee Seo-hyun and a male representative holding an 'Areumi' eco-bag, explaining that proceeds from its sale go to charity for children.

The two female hosts hold up event brochures, announce prize winners for live commerce participants, and encourage continued support for startups. A text overlay indicates '라이브커머스 참가자들을 위한 경품행사' (Prize event for live commerce participants).
The two female hosts wave goodbye as the live commerce segment officially concludes, with a text overlay indicating its end.
A medium, tracking shot follows the two female hosts as they walk off-camera, smiling and interacting with the production crew.
A medium close-up of Lee Ji-yo talking directly to the camera, expressing her surprise and gratitude for the large audience and their support.
A wide shot pans across the event hall, showing the various booths and attendees, concluding with a message wishing for the development of startup companies.

recurring_sequences: Product demonstration (Medium Shot, often with a representative)
Two shot of hosts for transitions and introductions.
editing_patterns.dominant_camera_style: Mostly static shots for formal presentations and product demos, with occasional tracking or panning for establishing shots and movement.

narrative_structure: Introduction (Event branding, setup, host introductions) → Opening Ceremony (Formal speeches) → Live Commerce Preparation (Rehearsals, behind-the-scenes) → Live Commerce Broadcast (Product demonstrations by hosts and representatives, audience interaction shown via screen captures) → Closing (Farewell, prize announcements, final message).
summary: The video effectively documents a hybrid startup event, blending formal opening ceremonies with dynamic live commerce segments. The editing style balances static, informative shots for speeches and product details with more dynamic, shorter cuts for behind-the-scenes and interactive moments. The use of screen captures for live comments effectively conveys audience engagement. The overall tone is professional yet engaging, aiming to showcase the startups and the event's innovative format.
